33.text:
w = element.width / 2
h = element.height / 2
x = element.left + w
y = element.top + h

28.text:
renderFreeIconShape(
    ctx,
    visuals,
    element,
    buildRectCoords,
    undefined
)

30.text:
ctx.fillStyle = ctx.strokeStyle
padding = w / 4
x0 = x - w + padding
x1 = x + w - padding
y0 = y - h + padding
y1 = y - h + w * 1.5
y2 = y + h - w * 1.5
y3 = y + h - padding
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(x0, y1)
ctx.lineTo(x, y0)
ctx.lineTo(x1, y1)
ctx.closePath()
ctx.fill()
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(x, y3)
ctx.lineTo(x0, y2)
ctx.lineTo(x1, y2)
ctx.closePath()
ctx.fill()
